SELECT * FROM ( select info.* from ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(ol PK_ORDER_LIST)*/ ROWNUM AS rn, ol.product_order_code AS product_order_code, ol.company_code AS company_code, ol.company AS company, product_summary('order_product', product_order_code) AS summary, ol.charger AS orderCharger, ol.order_date AS order_date, ol.delivery_request_deadline AS dedt, get_comm(ol.order_status) AS orderStatus FROM order_list ol
AND ol.product_order_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.orderCode}) || '%' --주문코드
AND ol.amount BETWEEN #{cri.totalAmountStart} AND #{cri.totalAmountEnd} --금액합계
AND ol.product_order_code IN (SELECT op.product_order_code FROM order_product op JOIN product_info pi ON (op.product_code = pi.product_code) WHERE pi.product_name LIKE '%' || #{cri.productName} || '%') --제품명
AND ol.product_order_code IN (SELECT product_order_code FROM order_product WHERE UPPER(product_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.productCode}) || '%') --제품코드
AND ol.company LIKE '%' || #{cri.companyName} || '%' --업체명
AND ol.company_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.companyCode}) || '%' --업체코드
AND ol.charger LIKE '%' || #{cri.orderCharger} || '%' --주문 담당자
AND ol.order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{cri.orderDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{cri.orderDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --주문일
AND ol.delivery_request_deadline BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{cri.dedtStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{cri.dedtEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --납기일
AND order_status = #{cri.orderStatus}
AND order_status IN ('OR01', 'OR06')
)info WHERE info.rn <= #{cri.end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{cri.start}

WITH order_info AS ( --주문정보 SELECT ol.product_order_code AS product_order_code, ol.company_code AS company_code, ol.charger AS charger, ol.amount AS amount FROM order_list ol ), products AS ( --제품정보 SELECT op.product_order_code AS product_order_code, op.product_code AS product_code, pi.product_name AS product_name, SUM(op.qy) AS total_qy FROM order_product op JOIN product_info pi ON op.product_code = pi.product_code WHERE op.product_order_code = #{product_order_code} GROUP BY op.product_order_code, op.product_code, pi.product_name ), company_info AS ( --회사정보 SELECT cp.company_code AS company_code, al.address_main || ' ' || al.address_info AS address -- 주소 결합 시 공백 추가 FROM company cp JOIN address_list al ON cp.address_seq = al.address_seq ) -- 주문번호, 주문담당자, 주문수량, 금액합계, 주소, 제품코드, 제품명 SELECT m.product_order_code AS product_order_code, m.charger AS charger, t.total_qy AS req_qy, m.amount AS amount, s.address AS address, t.product_code AS product_code, t.product_name AS product_name FROM order_info m JOIN company_info s ON m.company_code = s.company_code JOIN products t ON m.product_order_code = t.product_order_code WHERE m.product_order_code = #{product_order_code}

SELECT product_code, product_size AS product_size, product_size AS size_sort, get_comm(product_size) AS show_size FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} GROUP BY product_size, product_code ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(size_sort, 3))

WITH product_size AS ( --잔여량 검색 SELECT op.product_order_code AS order_code, op.product_code AS product_code, op.product_color AS product_color, 're' || get_comm(op.product_size) AS forpvt, (op.qy - COALESCE(SUM(dd.delivery_qy), 0)) AS request_qy --출고 완료된 건을 가져와서 요청수량에서 빼기, 출고건이 하나도 없으면 null이기 때문에 coalesce함수 사용하여 0리턴 FROM order_product op LEFT JOIN delivery_details dd --출고건 아직 없는 첫번째 출고건일 경우 delivery_details테이블에는 정보가 없어 left join ON op.product_order_code = dd.order_code --제품의 옵션이 맞는 수량을 가져오기 위한 join문 AND op.product_code = dd.product_code AND op.product_color = dd.product_color AND op.product_size = dd.product_size WHERE op.product_order_code = #{orderCode} --주문 코드 AND op.product_code = #{productCode} --제품 코드 GROUP BY op.product_order_code, op.product_code, op.product_color, op.product_size, op.qy --delivery_details와 조인하면 로트수량, 출고건이 여러건일 경우 여러개가 생기기때문에 그룹함수 사용 HAVING (op.qy - COALESCE(SUM(dd.delivery_qy), 0)) > 0 --잔여량이 0이하인 경우는 결과에서 제외시킴 ), inventory_data AS ( --재고 수량 검색 SELECT #{orderCode} AS order_code, --피벗 함수내에서 사용하기 위한 주문코드, inventory테이블에는 해당 정보가 없기 때문에 직접 넣어서 알레아스 i.product_code, i.product_color, 'in' || get_comm(i.product_size) AS forpvt, SUM(i.inventory_qy) AS request_qy FROM inventory i WHERE i.product_code = #{productCode} --제품 코드 AND i.inventory_qy > 0 --수량이 0이상인 데이터만 검색 GROUP BY i.product_code, i.product_color, i.product_size ), combined_data AS ( SELECT order_code, product_code, product_color, forpvt, request_qy FROM product_size -- union all로 모든 결과를 합함 UNION ALL SELECT order_code, product_code, product_color, forpvt, request_qy FROM inventory_data ) SELECT * --피벗을 사용하기 위해서는 select *로 검색해야 돼서 사용한 서브쿼리 FROM ( SELECT order_code, product_code, product_color, forpvt, request_qy FROM combined_data ) src PIVOT ( SUM(request_qy) FOR forpvt IN ( -- findBySize에서 동적으로 가져온 사이즈 리스트, re: 요청수량 / in: 재고수량 '${'re' + size.showSize}' AS ${'re' + size.showSize}, '${'in' + size.showSize}' AS ${'in' + size.showSize}
) ) pvt

SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH('DEV' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(delivery_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0)) = 9 THEN null ELSE 'DEV' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(delivery_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0) END FROM delivery WHERE TO_CHAR(rgsde, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)), ('DEV' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '0001')) AS delivery_code FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(de PK_DELIVERY)*/ ROWNUM AS rn, de.delivery_code AS delivery_code, ol.product_order_code AS product_order_code, de.company_code AS company_code, de.company_name AS company, de.order_date AS order_date, de.dedt AS dedt, product_summary('delivery_details', de.delivery_code) AS summary, de.time AS time, get_comm(de.delivery_status) AS delivery_status, de.remark AS remark, de.storage_name AS storage_name, de.dedt_address AS dedt_address, de.delivery_status AS comm_status, TO_CHAR(de.rgsde, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS regist_date, de.charger_code AS delivery_charger_code, de.charger_name AS delivery_charger FROM delivery de JOIN order_list ol ON de.product_order_code = ol.product_order_code

--구분, 담당자코드, 담당자, 등록일 SELECT de.charger_code AS delivery_charger_code, de.charger_name AS delivery_charger_name, TO_CHAR(de.rgsde, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS delivery_rgsde, pa.charger_code AS packing_charger_code, pa.charger_name AS packing_charger_name, TO_CHAR(pa.rgsde, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS packing_rgsde, ds.charger_code AS driver_charger_code, ds.charger_name AS driver_charger_name, TO_CHAR(ds.rgsde, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS driver_rgsde, ds.driver_code AS driver_code, ds.driver_name AS driver_name, TO_CHAR(ds.start_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS drive_start_time FROM delivery de LEFT JOIN packing pa ON (de.delivery_code = pa.delivery_code) LEFT JOIN delivery_schedule ds ON (de.delivery_code = ds.delivery_code) WHERE de.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode}

SELECT dd.delivery_code AS delivery_code, dd.product_code AS product_code, pi.product_name AS product_name, SUM(dd.delivery_qy) AS qy_sum, pi.vl AS vl FROM delivery_details dd JOIN product_info pi ON (dd.product_code = pi.product_code) WHERE dd.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode} GROUP BY dd.delivery_code, dd.product_code, pi.product_name, pi.vl
